privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: VideoPlayer ("we", "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we handle information in our app.
privacy.admob: Google AdMob: We use Google AdMob to show ads in the app. AdMob may collect and use data (such as device identifiers and ad interaction data) as described in Google's Privacy Policy. You can control ad personalization in your Google account settings.
privacy.storage: Storage permission: We request access to your device storage (or video/media) only to find and play your local video files. We do not upload, copy, or send your files to any server.
privacy.internet: Internet permission: The app uses the internet only to load ads via Google AdMob and to fetch ad-related content. Your video files are played locally and are not sent over the internet.
privacy.noPersonalData: We do not collect, store, or share any personal data (such as name, email, or phone). Any data used by ad services is governed by their respective privacy policies.
privacy.contact: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the app store listing or your preferred channel.
